metadata.title: CVE-2018-18454 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: CCITTFaxStream::readRow() in Stream.cc in Xpdf 4.00 allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read) via a craftedpdf file, as demonstrated by pdftoppm.

criterions.comment: xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
